item.description: Join us for"Whadd Ya Know" Team Trivia at the BBC in Framingham. Trivia starts at 7:30pm. We will meet at 7:00pm to get a spot or two, or three. Join us for drinks, food and a fun time playing team trivia. Everyone is responsible for their own food/drink. Please don't hesitate to walk up to me and claim your spot on our (usually) award winning team(s) !
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Patrick, who is hard to miss...
item.name: "Whadd Ya Know" Team Trivia at the BBC in Framingham
